mapper.sql: catalog_id, catalog_name, catalog_alias, catalog_desc, status, operator, update_time, create_time
mapper.insert:
SELECT nextval('t_base_catalog_catalog_id_seq'::regclass) as catalog_id
insert into t_base_catalog (catalog_id, catalog_name, catalog_alias, catalog_desc, status, operator, update_time, create_time) values (#{catalogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catalogName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1', #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp)
mapper.update: update t_base_catalog set catalog_name = #{catalogName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, catalog_alias = #{catalogAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, catalog_desc = #{catalogDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_timestamp where catalog_id = #{catalogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
